document_data.mainbody:
he Rapids was the only inn left standing in Teshwave around 1367 DR.
The Rapids was run by four citizens of Teshwaveâ€”Hallorfan Teshdale, Tula Woodsbridge, Doryn, and Calla Ayetes. In reality they were little more than indentured servants forced to cook, clean, and brew ale by the Zhentilar troops stationed in the town.
